languages.text: "Капитан рапортует о неожиданной находке: в попытке обогнуть варп-аномалию "Бессердечный" отклонился от маршрута и обнаружил не обозначенный на картах планетоид. На поверхности разведотряд нашел руины имперских укреплений, на вид очень древних, и следы масштабной битвы, но главное — чудом уцелевшее оружие, достойное коллекции Вашей Светлости".

"The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."
languages.original_text: "Капитан рапортует о неожиданной находке: в попытке обогнуть варп-аномалию "Бессердечный" отклонился от маршрута и обнаружил не обозначенный на картах планетоид. На поверхности разведотряд нашел руины имперских укреплений, на вид очень древних, и следы масштабной битвы, но главное — чудом уцелевшее оружие, достойное коллекции Вашей Светлости".

On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications and the evidence of a large-scale battle, but most importantly, a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

languages.text: 「船長から思いがけない発見の報告があります。〈歪み〉の異常を避けようとした際、ハートレスは予定航路を逸れ、偶然にも未登録の小惑星に出くわしました。表面では偵察隊が古代帝国の要塞跡と思われる遺構と大規模な戦闘の痕跡を発見しました。しかし、何よりも重要なのは、奇跡的に保存された、閣下のコレクションにふさわしい武器を見つけたことです」
languages.original_text: "The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

traits.locale_text: 「船長から思いがけない発見の報告があります。〈歪み〉の異常を避けようとした際、ハートレスは予定航路を逸れ、偶然にも未登録の小惑星に出くわしました。表面では偵察隊が古代帝国の要塞跡と思われる遺構と大規模な戦闘の痕跡を発見しました。しかし、何よりも重要なのは、奇跡的に保存された、閣下のコレクションにふさわしい武器を見つけたことです」

languages.text: "Kaptan, beklenmedik bir bulguyu bildiriyor: Taşkalp, bir öteboyut anomalisinden kaçarken amaçlanan rotasından sapmış ve işaretlenmemiş bir cüce gezegene rastlamış. Yüzeye inen bir keşif ekibi, görünüşte eski İmparatorluk tahkimatlarının kalıntılarını ve büyük ölçekli bir savaşın kanıtlarını keşfetmiş. En önemlisiyse {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin koleksiyona layık, mucizevi bir şekilde korunmuş bir silah bulmuşlar."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan, beklenmedik bir bulguyu bildiriyor: Taşkalp, bir öteboyut anomalisinden kaçarken amaçlanan rotasından sapmış ve işaretlenmemiş bir cüce gezegene rastlamış. Yüzeye inen bir keşif ekibi, görünüşte eski İmparatorluk tahkimatlarının kalıntılarını ve büyük ölçekli bir savaşın kanıtlarını keşfetmiş. En önemlisiyse {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin koleksiyona layık, mucizevi bir şekilde korunmuş bir silah bulmuşlar."

languages.text: «El capitán informa de un hallazgo inesperado. Mientras evitaba una anomalía en la disformidad, la Desalmada se desvió de su rumbo y acabó en un planetoide no registrado. El grupo de exploradores enviado a la superficie encontró las ruinas de una antigua fortificación imperial y los restos de una gran batalla. Además, encontraron un arma digna de pertenecer a la colección de mi{mf|lord|lady} que milagrosamente se conservaba en perfecto estado».
languages.original_text: "The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

traits.locale_text: «El capitán informa de un hallazgo inesperado. Mientras evitaba una anomalía en la disformidad, la Desalmada se desvió de su rumbo y acabó en un planetoide no registrado. El grupo de exploradores enviado a la superficie encontró las ruinas de una antigua fortificación imperial y los restos de una gran batalla. Además, encontraron un arma digna de pertenecer a la colección de mi{mf|lord|lady} que milagrosamente se conservaba en perfecto estado».

languages.text: “无心号的舰长报告说，他们找到了一项意想不到的发现。之前，无心号试图避开亚空间异常，偏离了预定的航线，但却意外发现了某颗星图上没有标记的小行星。探索队伍在小行星表面发现了古老的废墟，看起来像是帝国的防御工事，存留着大规模战斗留下的痕迹。不过最重要的是，他们竟然发现了一件保存得完好无损的武器。这件武器可以加入您的藏品之中，大人。”
languages.original_text: "The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

traits.locale_text: “无心号的舰长报告说，他们找到了一项意想不到的发现。之前，无心号试图避开亚空间异常，偏离了预定的航线，但却意外发现了某颗星图上没有标记的小行星。探索队伍在小行星表面发现了古老的废墟，看起来像是帝国的防御工事，存留着大规模战斗留下的痕迹。不过最重要的是，他们竟然发现了一件保存得完好无损的武器。这件武器可以加入您的藏品之中，大人。”

languages.text: "Der Captain meldet einen unerwarteten Fund: Als sie versuchte, einer Warp-Anomalie auszuweichen, kam die Heartless von ihrem Kurs ab und stieß zufällig auf einen nicht verzeichneten Planetoiden. Auf seiner Oberfläche entdeckte ein Erkundungstrupp die Ruinen einer alten imperialen Festung und Hinweise auf eine Schlacht von beträchtlichem Ausmaß. Vor allem entdeckten sie aber eine wie durch ein Wunder erhaltene Waffe, die der Sammlung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} würdig ist."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

traits.locale_text: "Der Captain meldet einen unerwarteten Fund: Als sie versuchte, einer Warp-Anomalie auszuweichen, kam die Heartless von ihrem Kurs ab und stieß zufällig auf einen nicht verzeichneten Planetoiden. Auf seiner Oberfläche entdeckte ein Erkundungstrupp die Ruinen einer alten imperialen Festung und Hinweise auf eine Schlacht von beträchtlichem Ausmaß. Vor allem entdeckten sie aber eine wie durch ein Wunder erhaltene Waffe, die der Sammlung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} würdig ist."

languages.text: « Le capitaine signale un fait inhabituel : afin d'éviter une anomalie du Warp, l'équipage du Sans-Cœur a dévié de la trajectoire initiale et a découvert un planétoïde inconnu. Une équipe de reconnaissance a été dépêchée à sa surface et a découvert les ruines de ce qui semble être d'anciennes fortifications impériales, ainsi que les traces d'un affrontement d'envergure. Mais surtout, elle a mis à jour une arme miraculeusement préservée, digne de rejoindre votre collection, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "The captain reports an unexpected find: while attempting to avoid a warp anomaly, the Heartless strayed from its intended course and chanced upon an unmarked planetoid. On its surface, a scouting party discovered the ruins of seemingly ancient Imperial fortifications, along with evidence of a large-scale battle. But, most importantly, they found a miraculously preserved weapon worthy of being part of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s collection."

Une équipe de reconnaissance a été dépêchée à sa surface et a découvert les ruines de ce qui semble être d'anciennes fortifications impériales, ainsi que les traces d'un affrontement d'envergure. Mais surtout, elle a mis à jour une arme miraculeusement préservée, digne de rejoindre votre collection, Votre Seigneurie. »
